verse:
नैषा तर्केण मतिरापनेया प्रोक्तान्येनैव सुज्ञानाय प्रेष्ठ।
यां त्वमापः सत्यधृतिर्बतासि त्वादृङ नो भूयान्नचिकेतः प्रष्टा ॥

terms.मतिरापनेया: and intellect should not be applied to it
terms.प्रोक्तान्येनैव: It is inferred only through teachings
terms.सुज्ञानाय: to one who has profound knowledge.
terms.प्रेष्ठ: O Nachiketa, the best among men!
terms.त्वमापः: you have inquired about, the knowledge of Atman

upanishad-org.meaning: This wisdom is not to be had by reasoning, O beloved Nachiketas; only when told thee by another it brings real knowledge,—the wisdom which thou hast gotten. Truly thou art steadfast in the Truth! Even such a questioner as thou art may I meet with always.
